page.title: 12A Day in the Life of Stephen
page.content: I got up at 8.45 a.m., washed and dressed. It was raining again ! I switched on the T.V. to watch{'Roland {Rat Superstar'}then turned to{B.B.C.1} to see the{'Pink Panther'.}I had cornflakes for breakfast. It had stopped raining so my{brother {Roy,}Mum and I walked up the village to the bus stop a mile away. We caught the bus to{Richmond}and went to the swimming baths. When we came out of the pool we dressed and went upstairs to the cafe and had lunch. I had ham and tomato sandwiches, a tin of {'Coca-Cola'}and some biscuits. Roy had a meat pie and Mum cheese sandwiches with a drink of coffee. We walked into Richmond, went into {Woolworth's}and looked at the toys. Then we went to a shoe shop and Mum bought Roy and me a pair of new school shoes each.We then caught the bus home
